snippet: Floyd Mayweather Jr. did most of the talking after his victory over Marcos Maidana on Saturday night in Las Vegas.
abstract: Sports analysis; Floyd Mayweather Jr, who improved his record to 46-0 with a tough majority decision in fight against Marcos Maidana, maximizes every opportunity to build his brand; he pulls every lever in the campaign, from the way his fights play out to the hoopla surrounding once mundane routines like weigh-ins and sessions with the news media.
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr. did most of the talking after his victory over Marcos Maidana on Saturday night in Las Vegas.

headline.main: Mayweather Unleashes Jabs and Punch Lines
headline.print_headline: Mayweather Unleashes Jabs and Punch Lines
